pageContext.claim: “That is why it's critical to have armed personnel available at a moment's notice. These are people -- teachers, in many cases -- that are the highest trained that you can get. People that are natural to firearms. People that know how to handle them. People that have great experience and, on top of the experience, have taken courses. And they're right on the site. This is critical to the hardening of our schools against attack. Also they love our students. I've seen the teachers.”
pageContext.analysis: Data is scant to support Trump's suggestion that arming teachers would curb school shootings. Many efforts to implement this policy have met resistance from teachers unions, meaning there are few places where this is allowed. And then, school shootings are rare. Plus, Trump's statement and policy makes a critical assumption that an armed teacher would be near a shooter. Plus, researchers have pointed out there is a difference between being familiar with a gun and trained to use one.
